alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Mineral; Sanders (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued March 02 at 9:05AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID ...The Forest Service Idaho Panhandle Avalanche Center Sandpoint ID has continued a Backcountry Avalanche Warning... * WHAT...The avalanche danger is HIGH. * WHERE...The mountains of Northwest Montana. * WHEN...In effect until 9 PM MST this evening * IMPACTS...High elevation rain and warm temperatures on a previously dry snowpack continue to result in widespread areas of unstable snow. Large and very large wet slab avalanches remain likely until colder temperatures start to stabilize the snowpack.
info.instruction: Very dangerous avalanche conditions. Travel on and below steep slopes is not recommended. Avalanches may run long distances. Consult http://www.idahopanhandleavalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of any Avalanche Center.
